name: Anant
description:
In Anant, players take on the role of a lone astronaut whose spaceship crashes on an unknown asteroid. After being sucked into a wormhole, the astronaut finds themselves facing off against three mysterious alien creatures. These beings survive by feeding off of human distress, so they trap the astronaut in a twisted maze.

The astronaut must navigate through the maze, solving puzzles and fighting off enemies in order to escape. The maze is made up of different levels, each with their own unique challenges and obstacles to overcome. As the astronaut progresses through the maze, they will uncover the truth about their captors and the strange world they are trapped in. Will the astronaut be able to outsmart the aliens and find a way back home, or will they become another victim of the creatures' insatiable hunger for distress?
